message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand you have a budget, but $11,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further.  How about $13,000? It's a fair price, considering the value of the product to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $12,500?
